com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue

Interface YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE


  • public interface YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      YFSExtnTaxCalculationOutStruct recalculateLineTax(YFSEnvironment env, YFSExtnLineTaxCalculationInputStruct inStruct)
      The YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE user exit can be used to recalculate the tax for the order at the line level.

    • Method Detail

      • recalculateLineTax

        YFSExtnTaxCalculationOutStruct recalculateLineTax(YFSEnvironment env,
                                                  YFSExtnLineTaxCalculationInputStruct inStruct)
                                           throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE user exit can be used to recalculate the tax for the order at the line level. This user exit is called at the Change Price order modification, when the shipping address changes, at invoicing, and at the calculation of release costs. It is also invoked when the SettledQuantity of an order line changes in order to compute the SettledAmount; these taxes are not stored separately and are only rolled up into the SettledAmount.

        Delayed Reauthorization

        When delayed Authorization is enabled, this user exit will be called if implemented to determine how to divide the line taxes on the order by the expected release dates of its lines.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the method in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.


        Pre-conditions: This user exit is called:

        • for invoices
          • unconditionally

              • If the line tax is reduced by this user exit call and the order is not completely invoiced, the order will not be updated until the order is completely invoiced.
        • for releases
          • when PackListPriceInfo is in the template
        • for orders
          • when delayed authorization is enabled
          • under different modification conditions. See the createOrder and changeOrder javadocs for more information.

        Post-conditions: The order line tax is determined by the user extension.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inStruct - Required. For details on the input, see YFSExtnLineTaxCalculationInputStruct.


        Returns:
        outStruct For details on the output, see YFSExtnTaxCalculationOutStruct.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
